entry.title: My Leadership Makes Me a Qualified Candidate Because
entry.summary: Most Senior SGA officerProposed four constitutional amendments that have been passed by the SenateDrafted two resolutions to embody the voice of the student body SenateI strive to be available to help my colleagues will also making sure I delegate work outMet with every RSO twice…
entry.content:
• Most Senior SGA officer
  • Proposed four constitutional amendments that have been passed by the Senate
  • Drafted two resolutions to embody the voice of the student body Senate
  • I strive to be available to help my colleagues will also making sure I delegate work out
  • Met with every RSO twice while serving as ABC chair
  • I am the only current SGA officer who has:
    • Proposed a Constitutional amendment
    • Drafted a Resolution
    • Served in the Judicial and Legislative branch
  • During my time at Florida Poly, I have been:
    • Associate Justice
    • Judicial Treasurer
    • Sophomore Representative
    • Audit and Budget Committee Chair
    • Junior Representative
    • Senate President
    • Member of every standing committee of the Senate
    • Orientation Leader
    • Residential Life Desk assistant
    • Treasurer of the Themed Entertainment Association

entry.title: Why My Vision To Florida Poly Make Me an Excelent Candidate
My Contributions to Florida Poly Make Me an Excelent Candidate Because

2017-2018: Associate Justice

2018: Judicial Treasurer

2018-2019: Sophomore Rep

2018-2019: Audit and budget chair

2019-2020: Junior Representative

2019-2020: Senate President
